content.math_content: \left\{ \begin{array}{l l} { \frac {\mathrm {d} z}{\mathrm {d} x} = f + x \left(1 + \frac {\mathrm {d} y}{\mathrm {d} x}\right) f ^ {\prime},} \\ { F _ {x} ^ {\prime} + F _ {y} ^ {\prime} \frac {\mathrm {d} y}{\mathrm {d} x} + F _ {z} ^ {\prime} \frac {\mathrm {d} z}{\mathrm {d} x} = 0,} \end{array} \right. \text {即} \left\{ \begin{array}{l l} {- x f ^ {\prime} \frac {\mathrm {d} y}{\mathrm {d} x} + \frac {\mathrm {d} z}{\mathrm {d} x} = f + x f ^ {\prime},} \\ { F _ {y} ^ {\prime} \frac {\mathrm {d} y}{\mathrm {d} x} + F _ {z} ^ {\prime} \frac {\mathrm {d} z}{\mathrm {d} x} = - F _ {x} ^ {\prime},} \end{array} \right.
\frac {\partial Q}{\partial x} = \mathrm {e} ^ {x} \cos y - a, \quad \frac {\partial P}{\partial y} = \mathrm {e} ^ {x} \cos y - b,

paragraph_content.content: 五、【解】 方法一 曲线

content.math_content: \begin{array}{l} f ^ {\prime} (x) = 2 x \ln x + x - \frac {1}{x} - 2 (x - 1) = 2 x \ln x - x - \frac {1}{x} + 2, f ^ {\prime} (1) = 0, \\ f ^ {\prime \prime} (x) = 2 \ln x + 2 - 1 + \frac {1}{x ^ {2}} = 2 \ln x + 1 + \frac {1}{x ^ {2}}, f ^ {\prime \prime} (1) = 2 > 0, \\ f ^ {\prime \prime} (x) = \frac {2}{x} - \frac {2}{x ^ {3}} = \frac {2 (x ^ {2} - 1)}{x ^ {3}}, \\ \end{array}

title_content.content: 七、【解】设将空斗从井底拉至井口拉力做功为

paragraph_content.content: \mathrm{d}S = \sqrt{1 + \left(\frac{\partial z}{\partial x}\right)^2 + \left(\frac{\partial z}{\partial y}\right)^2} \, \mathrm{d}x \, \mathrm{d}y = \frac{\sqrt{4 - x^2 - y^2}}{2z} \, \mathrm{d}x \, \mathrm{d}y,

content.math_content: = \frac {1}{4} \iint_ {D _ {x y}} (4 - x ^ {2} - y ^ {2}) \mathrm {d} x \mathrm {d} y = \frac {1}{4} \int_ {0} ^ {2 \pi} \mathrm {d} \theta \int_ {0} ^ {\sqrt {2}} (4 r - r ^ {3}) \mathrm {d} r = \frac {3 \pi}{2}.
